background.royal: is part of the royal family
background.cleric: is a high cleric of the main religion of the region
background.merchant: is a successful and powerful merchant
background.rebel: is a powerful revolutionary preacher among the populous
background.cultLeader: is secretly a powerful Cult Leader that operates in the shadows
background.beggar: is a drunk beggar in need for a change
background.champion: is a powerful champion of a main god from the pantheon with an important mission
background.god: is a god in disguise with a selfish agenda

leitmotiv.murder: has commited a murder that wants to keep secret
leitmotiv.insane: is gone completely insane, and madness pushes to the wrong path
leitmotiv.affliction: is afflicted with a secret maladie that is consuming

plotTwist.tooLate: regardless, in the end it is too late
plotTwist.villainHero: the villain is in reality, the hero
plotTwist.ruse: in the end it was all a ruse
plotTwist.game: in the end it was all a game

religionPlot.discontent: there is an angry deity that is showing its discontent
religionPlot.disappointed: a deity is disappointed in its believers and they are now striving to gain back its favor
religionPlot.greed: a deity has greedy goals and is meddling in the world to obtain what it wants
religionPlot.affliction: a deity has contracted a rare affliction
religionPlot.feud: there is a feud between two gods and it shows signs in the world
religionPlot.deposed: a deity has defeated and deposed another

timeframe.war: The story happens during times of war
timeframe.peace: The story happens during times of peace and prosperity
timeframe.merging: The story happens during the merging of two noble houses
timeframe.religious: The story happens during religious unrest
timeframe.cultural: The story happens during cultural unrest
